attributes.action: First time speeding Offenses, should carry less points.
attributes.additional_details: First time speeding offenses are not taken in to account, if you have a full clean driving license, with no points / endorsements. I think its wrong that this has no infuence on your first driving offense, a clean driving license proves your previous driving ability, if it doesn't then why do we have a paper licence at all. I believe that drivers within a guidelined category, that fall into this braket shouldn't be penalized in the same way.
